product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies MoonForce 2 AAA Flashlight
long_description: Sporting a MoonBeam lens that sheds a bright 80-lumen circle of light, this rugged flashlight provides up to 40 hrs. of output with an unbreakable LED bulb that never needs replacing.
short_description: Sporting a MoonBeam lens that sheds a bright 80-lumen circle of light, this rugged flashlight provides up to 40 hrs. of output with an unbreakable LED bulb that never needs replacing.
